string.body: Horned Abex;An animal living near [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_A2] alongside the Ettin. Many people hunt them for their horns.

string.body: Humpback Worg;An aggressive animal roaming on the barren slopes of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_B]. It has sharp teeth and claws.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LehparWa3_33_An
string.body: Trainee Scout;A Lepharist guarding a small campsite on [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_B]. When they have no particular duties, they enjoy making soup from the Longhorn Abex near their camp.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LehparKnight_33_An
string.body: Scout Fighter;A fighter in charge of training the scout trainees on [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_B]. They maintain a state of constant vigilance.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_Cherubim3_32_An
string.body: Kerubiel Sentinel;A kind of Kerubiel that can be seen in near the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_D1]. There is a theory that they were once Kerubs, but a drastic mutation has transformed them into their current form.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_Cherubim3_34_An
string.body: Kerubiel Patrol;Patrols guarding the Kerubiel dens scattered around the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_D2]. They have what appear to be vestigial wings, so scholar have suggested that they may once have been able to fly.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_Cherubim4_33_An
string.body: Kerubiel Looter;Violent Kerubiels that can be seen in the Kerubiel dens scattered around the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_D2]. One of the most widespread theories about the traces of wings on their backs is that they are still evolving.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_BasiliskRe_33_An
string.body: Red Spotted basilisk;A Basilisk living in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_D2]. Why this creature, which crackles with fire energy, came to be in a marsh is one of Aion's little mysteries.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_ClodwormRe_33_An
string.body: Black Spotted Clodworm;A creature that can be seen in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_D2]. Most people go to great lengths to avoid these creatures.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_Agrint_34_An
string.body: Lumbering Agrint;A tree monster living in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_D3]. Its attacks are known to sting ferociously.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_Rottentree_34_An
string.body: Greenclaw Rotron;A mutant creature in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_D3]. Its mossy claws only look cuddly--they could take the head off a Shulack.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_Zombie_34_An
string.body: Sluggish Zombie;A zombie in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_D3]. It has a nasty infectious bite, which can cause the bitten creature to become a zombie.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_Skeleton_35_An
string.body: Anubite Sentinel;A ghost that has been seen at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_D5]. It is said to be the cursed spirit of a farm worker.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_TrollRE_34_An
string.body: Troll Brawler;A monster roaming around the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_D4] with a huge hammer in its hand.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_CatosRE_34_An
string.body: Blind Keraton;A mysterious creature living in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_D4]. People call them Blind Keraton because they are born without eyes.

string.body: Frillneck Juvenile;A young Frillneck living in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_C1]. Its attack is just as powerful as an adult's.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_Frillfaimam1st_37_An
string.body: Sawmane Frillneck;A Frillneck living in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_C1]. An aggressive species, they often attack on sight.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_Centipede_37_An
string.body: Pincerjaw Laupede;An insect that has 17 pairs of legs and lives in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_C1]. It attacks enemies with its vice-like bite.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_ElementalEarth2_37_An
string.body: Ruined Earth Spirit;An aggressive Spirit that came into existence when the soil of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_C2] was contaminated with an unknown substance.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_ElementalEarth3_38_An
string.body: Decayed Earth Spirit;An aggressive Spirit that came into existence when the soil of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_C2] was contaminated with an unknown substance.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_ManduriBRe_39_An
string.body: Manduri Beater;A Manduri living in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_C1]. It flails at its enemies with both arms, and follows up with a headbutt.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_ManduriTRe_39_An
string.body: Manduri Thrower;A Manduri commonly seen in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_C4_add]. It attacks its enemies by throwing the red fruit commonly found on trees there.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_Frillfaimam2st_39_An
string.body: Silver Frillneck;A kind of Frillneck living near [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_C3] in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_C1].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_FrillfaimamNM2st_39_An
string.body: Redclaw Frillneck;A Frillneck that can be found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_C1]. It has red claws...no one speculates how they got red.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_FrillfaimamRE2st_39_An
string.body: Violent Frillneck;A Frillneck which belongs to the most violent tribe of Frillnecks living in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_C1].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_UndeadfarmerNm_38_An
string.body: Miserly Iscraw;A vengeful spirit that is said to appear at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_D5]. It is said that the farm owner Iscraw, who was very miserly, tortures the spirits of his tenants even after death.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_Banshee_37_An
string.body: Sobbing Banshee;A ghost known to appear at night around the collapsed house at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_D5]. The horror that has bound her spirit there as a ghost also made her hair stand on end like blades.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_Bookie_37_An
string.body: Ragged Boggart;A Boggart that appears frequently behind the wall of the collapsed house near [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_D5].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_Skeleton_37_An
string.body: Anubite Looter;One of the ghosts at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_D5]. Despite its form, the blade it wields still has bite.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_Zombie_36_An
string.body: Rotten Zombie;A zombie that can only crawl on the ground because its legs are rotten. There are plenty of them at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_D5].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_Rottentree_34_An_2
string.body: Greenclaw Rotron;It seems to be a kind of monster that have mutated from the rotten old tree in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_D3].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_XipetoMove_36_An
string.body: Severed Gnarl;A small tree monster in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_D7]. It is said to have been born from a snapped Agrint branch.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_SlimeRE_36_An
string.body: Sticky Slime;A contaminated creature that can be seen in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_D7]. Don't get it in your hair.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_OctasideRE_35_An
string.body: Goldenback Arachna;An Arachna in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_D7]. Its legs are deceptively strong weapons.

string.body: Golden Eye Mantutu;A giant, greedy Manduri guarding Grogget's safe on the ship Steel Rake. Savage but cowardly, it only obeys [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDShip_ShulackWiBreeder_42_Ae_ver30].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDShip_ShulackEngineerNmd_45_Ah
string.body: Engineer Lahulahu;The chief engineer of the Steel Beard Pirates. He can be found in the Drana Power Chamber on the ship. He's a naturally gifted engineer, but can be tetchy at times.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDShip_ShulackRaAtilleryChKnmd_45_Ah
string.body: Chief Gunner Koakoa;The chief gunner on the ship Steel Rake. He has a terrible temper and often starts fights with the crew.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDShip_ShulackCaptainNmd_46_Ah
string.body: Brass-Eye Grogget;The captain of the Steel Rake, usually found in the Steering House. He lost an arm in battle, and had a steel rake fitted in its place.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDElementalN_Nmd_Unicorn_60_Al

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDElementalN_Nmd_Farmer_60_Al
string.body: Tuali;A golem that once guarded the Elementis Forest, until being enslaved by Zadra. Tuali now drains sap from the Luminous Sapling.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDElementalN_Nmd_Bridge_60_Al
string.body: The Canyonguard;A huge being that guards the Canyonguard's Ravine. It was once a relic but has been revived by the power of Davlin.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDElementalN_Nmd_HalfGolem_60_Al

string.body: The Flamelord;The chief executioner of Terror's Vault in Raksang. His fire attack is as formidable as his judgment is harsh and unforgiving.

string.body: Padmarashka;A powerful Dramata who built her nest deep within the Forest of Antiquity in Inggison. She stayed behind to protect her brood, and does so vehemently.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDRaksha_4F_Evileye_Nmd_57_Ae
string.body: Paruam Sealguard;A huge creature at the bottom of Raksang. It appears when you kill all Informer Ashulagens floating above Raksang.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_OP_Neut_Worker_55_An
string.body: Mephitic Klaw Worker;A Klaw inhabiting [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_OP_21] under the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_OP].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_OP_Neut_Fly_55_An
string.body: Mephitic Supraklaw Worker;A Klaw inhabiting [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_OP_21] under the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_OP].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_OP_Neut_WorkerHigh_55_An
string.body: Mephitic Klaw Looker;A Klaw inhabiting [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_OP_21] under the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_OP].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_OP_Neut_FlyHigh_56_An
string.body: Mephitic Supraklaw Watcher;A Klaw inhabiting [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_OP_21] under the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_OP].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_OP_Clodworm_55_An
string.body: Stinking Clodworm;A Clodworm inhabiting [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_OP_21] under the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_OP]. It smells horrible.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_OP_WaterWorm_55_An
string.body: Mutant Waterworm;A Waterworm inhabiting [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_OP_21] under the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_OP].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_OP_Neut_Queen_Nmd_55_An
string.body: Queen Klawtiar;The queen of Klaws in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_OP_21]. She is very prolific, and fiercely defensive of her brood.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A1_FennecFox_56_n
string.body: Dustpaw Nojolf;A beast living in the desert area of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A1]. It's fairly harmless… until nightfall.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A1_FennecFox_N_56_An
string.body: Dustclaw Nojofar;Feeding off the energy of night, the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A1_FennecFox_56_n] becomes far more threatening.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A1_DragonFly_56_An
string.body: Leowasp Peon;Although this insectlike creature is at the bottom of their hive-like hierarchy, it's eager to defend its territory.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A1_SpakyButterfly_56_n
string.body: Poisonscale Moskie;A Moskie growing in the northern grassland of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A1]. Its poison powder causes serious headaches.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A1_Fungy_Flower_56_n
string.body: Seedleaf Fungie;A Fungie growing in the grassland of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A1]. The Reian Tribe often uses this nutritious Fungie as a food ingredient.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A1_Rafflesia_DR_56_An
string.body: Apivorous Malodor;A Malodor growing in the grassland of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A1]. It lures prey with its sweet fragrance.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A1_Lobster_DR_56_An
string.body: Highstrike Spiner;A Spiner inhabiting the eastern desert area of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A1].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A1_Scorpion_Rough_56_An
string.body: Charback Scolopen;A Scolopen inhabiting the eastern desert area of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A1]. It has deadly poison.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A1_Condor_DR_56_An
string.body: Molten Gryphu;It is believed that watercolor flyer's feathers are specifically adapted to keeping this Gryphu cool in the hottest environments.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A1_Shadowstalker_Leaf_56_An
string.body: Vengeful Excura;An Excura that appears in the west of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A1]. It is often found in a shady place.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A1_SalivadoRed_56_An
string.body: Bristlewhisker Hornskull;A Hornskull living in the desert area of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A1]. It often attacks refugees passing through the desert.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A1_Fellial_DR_56_An
string.body: Gravel Moonflower;A plant growing in the desert of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A1]. It lures prey with its beauty and attacks them mercilessly.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A1_Brax_DR_56_n
string.body: Plainsgrazer Brax;A Brax living in the grassland of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A1]. Usually docile, its hooves are well-suited to self-defence.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A1_Hiiv_DR_55_An
string.body: Bladebeak Airon;This generally docile Airon seems to jitter and dance when attacked.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A1_Debrie_DR_56_An
string.body: Mottled Ribbit;A rather handsome Ribbit with an impressive bite.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A1_FennecFox_Nmd_56_n
string.body: Rajalf the Cunning;A Nojolf that attacks only wounded refugees. He never challenges anyone stronger.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A4_FennecFox_N_Nmd_56_An
string.body: Gavijolf the Gouger;Attacks refugees and travelers under the cover of darkness. His main targets are children and old men.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A1_SalivadoRed_Nmd_56_Ae
string.body: Insidious Barolf;A Hornskull notorious for its brutality. It has a shining red tail.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A1_Brax_DR_Nmd_56_n
string.body: Gabo the Obstinate;The head of the Plainsgrazer Brax pack. Its territory is ten times larger than that of a normal Brax.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A1_SpakyButterfly_Nmd_56_n
string.body: Queen Maphis;The queen of Moskies, she spreads a poisonous pollen tinged with red.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A2_DragonFly_57_An
string.body: Leowasp Looter;A Leowasp that romps in the farming field to the west of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A2_01] and works in the service of the Balaur.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A2_SpakyButterfly_57_n
string.body: Deadly Poisonscale Moskie;A Moskie inhabiting [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A2]. It spreads deadly poisonous powder.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A2_Fungy_Flower_57_n
string.body: Poisonroot Fungie;A Fungie inhabiting [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A2] and [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A2_08_new]. Many people mistake it for [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A1_Fungy_Flower_56_n] and end up being poisoned by its roots.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A2_mammoth_DR_baby_56_n
string.body: Baby Trepone Mamut;[%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A2_mammoth_DR_57_An]'s baby. It is as gluttonous as its mother.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A2_mammoth_DR_57_An
string.body: Trepone Mamut;A Mamut inhabiting [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A2]. The Reian Tribe has been hunting it for its soft, juicy meat.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A2_Sheluk_Worm_57_An
string.body: Deadly Poisonbarb Sheluk;A Sheluk living in the north of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A2]. There is no known antidote to its poison.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A2_Mosbear_DR_56_An
string.body: Ferocious Mosbear;A Mosbear inhabiting [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A2], it uses its massive shoulders to knock down its prey.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A2_Brax_DR_57_n
string.body: Crookhorn Brax;Though usually docile, those horns will quickly drop its attackers to the ground.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A2_ShulackRa_57_An
string.body: Shulack Searcher;A Shulack occupying the area including [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A2_04] and the Destroyed Reian Village.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A2_IronGolem_57_An
string.body: Marabata Scout;A Marabata dispatched by Shulacks to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A2_02]. It is of low intelligence. You might be able to avoid its notice.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A2_ShulackFi_Nmd_57_Ae
string.body: Captain Babelkin;A Shulack known to have never failed to find his target. He is very tenacious, and dressed to impress!

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A2_DragonFly_Nmd_57_An
string.body: Ironjaw Tarapu;The leader of the Leowasp looters, it doesn't seem to be very powerful or intelligent.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A2_Sheluk_Worm_Nmd_57_An
string.body: Venomous Geruk;It is said that a drop of its poison can kill 10 Mamuts.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A2_IronGolem_Nmd_57_An
string.body: Kugen the Ravager;A weapon developed as a part of a contingency plan.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A2_Daru_DR_Nmd_57_n
string.body: Careful Peruru;A Daru that never lowers its guard. It unerringly finds the weak spot of its enemies.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A3_mammoth_DR_baby_56_n
string.body: Baby Cucutero Mamut;This baby Mamut likes to play with its food.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A3_mammoth_DR_57_An
string.body: Cucutero Mamut;Ever watchful of its little ones, this Mamut will not tolerate trespassers.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A3_Dionae_DR_57_An
string.body: Delirium Dionae;A Dionae inhabiting [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A3]. Its patterns are hallucinogenic.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_B1_Daru_DR_58_n
string.body: Greyhoof Daru;A Daru settled in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_B1]. It is fiercer than it looks.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A3_Agrint_DR_57_An
string.body: Gnarled Rotron;A Rotron growing on the fertile soil of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_B1].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A3_Mosbear_DR_57_An
string.body: Merciless Mosbear;Although smaller than its ferocious cousin, its affinity with the earth makes it just as dangerous.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A3_Sheluk_Worm_57_An
string.body: Venomtip Sheluk;A Sheluk inhabiting [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A3]. Its poison paralyses the nerves.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A3_Owllau_Fi_57_An
string.body: Strigik Fighter;A Strigik guarding [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A3_03]. It is a lesser warrior of the Urugugu Tribe.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A3_Owllau_As_57_An
string.body: Strigik Scouter;A Strigik guarding [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A3_03]. It is a lesser scout of the Urugugu Tribe.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A3_Owllau_Pr_57_An
string.body: Strigik Healer;A Strigik guarding [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A3_03]. It is a lesser soldier of the Urugugu Tribe.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A3_Lupyllini_DR_56_n
string.body: Periwinkle Pluma;A Pluma living by the water of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A3_03]. Its reddish feathers are widely used as accessories.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A3_Owllau_pet_57_Ae
string.body: Urugugu Guardian Spirit;A Spirit protecting the Urugugu Tribe.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A3_Owllau_Fi_57_Ae
string.body: Elite Strigik Fighter;A Strigik in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A3_04]. It is an elite soldier of the Urugugu Tribe.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A3_Owllau_As_57_Ae
string.body: Elite Strigik Assassin;A Strigik in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A3_04]. It is an elite soldier of the Urugugu Tribe.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A3_Owllau_Pr_57_Ae
string.body: Elite Strigik Healer;A Strigik in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A3_04]. It is an elite soldier of the Urugugu Tribe.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A3_Owllau_Wi_57_Ae
string.body: Elite Strigik Shaman;A Strigik in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A3_04]. It is an elite soldier of the Urugugu Tribe.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A3_Owllau_El_57_Ae
string.body: Elite Strigik Summoner;A Strigik in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A3_04]. It is an elite soldier of the Urugugu Tribe.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A3_Owllau_Fi_57_Nmd_An
string.body: Sergeant Gutu;The most elite fighter of the Urugugu tribe. He is now devoted to training young tribal warriors.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A3_Owllau_As_57_Nmd_Ae
string.body: Lutau the Slayer;An legendary assassin famed for moving in absolute silence.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A3_Owllau_Pr_57_Nmd_Ae
string.body: Prophet Huruhuru;A priest who foresees the future of the Urugugu Tribe. He manages all tribal matters.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A3_Owllau_Wi_57_Nmd_Ae
string.body: Fortuneteller Lusupa;The best fortuneteller of the Urugugu Tribe. Based on his knowledge of nature, he uses the most powerful magic among his tribesmen.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A3_Owllau_El_57_Nmd_Ah
string.body: Deputy Chieftain Aruru;A Urugugu tribesman helping Great Chieftain Zakufu to lead the tribe. He is in charge of maintaining contact between Spirits and the Urugugu Tribe.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A3_Owllauchief_Nmd_57_Ah
string.body: Great Chieftain Zakufu;The great chieftain named by the oracle. No one dares challenge his authority, which was bestowed upon him by god.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A4_FennecFox_56_n
string.body: Feral Nojolf;A Nojolf living in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A1_04]. It seems mostly harmless... until nightfall.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A4_FennecFox_N_56_An
string.body: Rabid Nojofar;A transformed Nojolf that has absorbed the energy of night. It is particularly dangerous.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A4_Fellial_DR_56_An
string.body: Sandtrap Moonflower;A Moonflower inhabiting [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A1_04]. Its shell is as hard as rock and makes it almost impenetrable.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A4_SandShark_57_An
string.body: Desert Zanthay;A Zanthay in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_B2] desert area.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A4_Lobster_DR_57_An
string.body: Sharpstrike Spiner;A Spiner roaming [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A1_04]. It poses a great threat to refugees.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A4_Worm_Oasis_56_An
string.body: Carnivorous Ampha;A creature that attacks everyone it sees. It inhabits the oasis area of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A1].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A4_Warg_DR_57_An
string.body: Ferocious Warg;A Warg wandering around the desert area of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A1].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A4_Condor_DR_57_An
string.body: Scavenger Gryphu;Although it prefers picking at carrion, this aggressive Gryphu is equally pleased to hunt live prey.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A4_DragonSnake_57_An
string.body: Sand Swamp Serrator;This Serrator is particularly well suited to its environment.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A4_ShadowStalker_Sand_57_An
string.body: Detritus Obscura;Sand, dirt, bits of bone--this Obscura picks up anything it encounters.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A4_SalivadoRed_57_An
string.body: Needlebeard Hornskull;A Hornskull inhabiting the desert area of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A1].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A4_Tog_57_An
string.body: Rabid Tog;A Tog raised by the Humnaz Tribe as an aggressive fighter with a savage bite.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A4_CalydonFi_57_An
string.body: Humnaz Sentry;A Calydon soldier guarding [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A4_03]. It sniffs out enemies and pursues them without mercy.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A4_CalydonAs_57_An
string.body: Humnaz Thief;A Calydon soldier guarding [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A4_03]. It often uses vile tricks to gain an upper paw with its adversaries.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A4_CalydonWi_57_An
string.body: Humnaz Shaman;A Calydon soldier guarding [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A4_03]. It uses vile spells and clever illusions.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A4_Tog_57_Ae
string.body: Tamed Tog;A Tog raised by Humnaz Tribe. It is well trained and often performs better than an ordinary warrior.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A4_CalydonFi_57_Ae
string.body: Elite Humnaz Warrior;A Calydon elite soldier stationed in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A4_04]. It is an excellent axe-wielder.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A4_CalydonAs_57_Ae
string.body: Elite Humnaz Assassin;A Calydon elite soldier stationed in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A4_04]. It is an excellent assassin.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A4_CalydonWi_57_Ae
string.body: Elite Humnaz Shaman;A Calydon elite soldier stationed in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A4_04]. It uses high-quality spells.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A4_CalydonRa_57_Ae
string.body: Elite Humnaz Bowman;A Calydon elite soldier stationed in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A4_04]. It uses a bow proficiently.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A4_CalydonPr_57_Ae
string.body: Elite Humnaz Healer[pl:"Healers"];An elite soldier stationed in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A4_04]. It uses high-quality healing magic.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A4_CalydonFi_57_Nmd_An
string.body: Chieftain Candidate Budugum;A young Calydon harbouring an ambition to become the chieftain of the Humnaz Tribe. He has already lost twice to Haridoo but hasn't given up on his dreams.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A4_CalydonAs_57_Nmd_Ae
string.body: Shadowstrike Gubacha;A troublemaker within the Humnaz Tribe. Once battle starts, he kills everyone, including his allies.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A4_CalydonWi_57_Nmd_Ae
string.body: Dumuch Faithhealer;A Calydon of Humnaz Tribe, who uses powerful magic based on his profound faith. He oversees all rituals and enjoys the full confidence of his tribesmen.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A4_CalydonRa_57_Nmd_Ae
string.body: Clairvoyant Sunachu;The best marksman the Humnaz Tribe has ever had, it is thought that he can see around corners. He is known to hit the tail feather of a flying bird.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A4_CalydonPr_57_Nmd_Ah
string.body: Chaburat the Noble;A direct descendent of Shantuku, the first chieftain of Humnaz Tribe. He and Haridoo are at odds with each other.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A4_Calydonchief_Nmd_57_Ah
string.body: Chieftain Haridoo;The chieftain of the Humnaz Tribe who has power matching his noble blood. Many chieftain candidates have knelt at his feet.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_B1_Fungy_Flower_58_n
string.body: Thornhair Fungie;This playful, intelligent Fungie is rather dangerous when attacked.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_B1_Octaside_leaf_58_An
string.body: Thornleaf Arachna;An Arachna inhabiting [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_B1]. Its protective colouring makes it inconspicuous.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_B1_Octaside_leaf_R_58_An
string.body: Needlespine Arachna;An Arachna inhabiting [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_B1]. Its protective colouring makes it inconspicuous.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_B1_Mosbear_DR_58_An
string.body: Lunatic Mosbear;A Mosbear inhabiting [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_B1]. It is very aggressive.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_B1_BrohumBFi_58_An
string.body: Brohie Fighter;A young Brohum of the Aponos Tribe.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_B1_BrohumGRa_58_An
string.body: Brohie Gunner;A young Brohum of the Aponos Tribe.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_B1_BrohumMFi_58_An
string.body: Brohum Gladiator;A gladiator of the Aponos Tribe guarding [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_B1_05].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_B1_BrohumFRa_58_An
string.body: Brohum Gunner;A gunner of the Aponos Tribe guarding [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_B1_05].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_B1_Mosbear_DR_Nmd_58_An
string.body: Vanuka the Earthshaker;Among the strongest of its species, it is said that it has never lost in vicious turf wars among Mosbears.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_B1_ElementalLightM_Nmd_58_Ae
string.body: Spirit of Tranquility;A Spirit that looks sick of prittle-prattle.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_B1_ElementalLightF_Nmd_58_An
string.body: Spirit of Silence;A Spirit who loves both making things silent and being silent.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_B1_Octaside_leaf_Nmd_58_An
string.body: Apona the Cultivator;An Arachna powerful enough to protect itself without protective colouring. Its loud colour warns you of its power.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_B1_BrohumGRa_Nmd_58_Ae
string.body: Haughty Kirke;Pretty in pink and deadly with a bow, Kirke's arrows follow you to your grave.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Under_Rune_FrostNmd_2_N_Ma_65_Ah_nouse
string.body: Rune Witch;Grendal Eroneil, the Necromancer of the ancient Rune Tribe. According to the records, she grieved deeply over the death of her beloved Narcis. She cursed the Rune Tribe and the rest of the world, and withdrew to the Runadium. She appears in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDLDF5_Under_Rune]

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF5A_G1_Mosbear_solo_Dark_63_An
string.body: Brohum Grove Hunter[pl:"Hunters"];A Brohum Grove Hunter found at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_G1].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF5A_G3_Feller_work_63_An
string.body: Repaired Saphirunerk Clearing Machine[pl:"Machines"];It is located in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_G3].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Under_GraveWitch_Q1_Wi_N_65_Ae
string.body: Liberated[pl:"Liberated"] Marones Elder[pl:"Elders"];An ancient spirit of the Rune Tribe that was confined inside the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_ZONE_NAME_LDF5_SZ_T1] in the [%dic:STR_DIC_N_OBJ_LDF5_Under_FOBJ_T1_Grave].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Under_GraveWitch_Q2_Wi_N_65_Ae
string.body: Grim[pl:"Grim"] Elder[pl:"Elders"] Dalanoah;An ancient spirit of the Rune Tribe, confined inside the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_ZONE_NAME_LDF5_SZ_T2] in the [%dic:STR_DIC_N_OBJ_LDF5_Under_FOBJ_T2_Grave].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Under_CoffinB_65_n
string.body: Nameless[pl:"Nameless"] Grave[pl:"Graves"];One of the many graves in the Katalam Underground, probably from the time of the Rune Tribe. It is not known what they contain.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDF5_TD_DragonRider_Chief_N_65_Al
string.body: Supreme Commander Pashid;A Beritra Army commander leading the attack on the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDLDF5b_TD]. He must be eliminated in order to end the conflict.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF5b_F1_Vri_Post_1st_Q_KN_Nmd_65_Ah
string.body: Captain Vasti;The captain of the 43rd Beritra Army's first unit. He is a battle-tested commander and leads the first unit, the unit with the most combat experience. He will appear randomly at one of the posts along the Beritra Defence Line in South Katalam.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF5a_5011_Vri_1stBoss_Q_Fi_Nmd_65_Al
string.body: Tavrosh;Brigade General of the 43rd Army, the Beritra core troops in Katalam, and supreme commander of all Beritra units posted in Katalam. He will only appear if the Balaur occupy the Sillus Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDF5_U2_P_VriIU_Wi_N_65_Ah
string.body: Staff Officer Syaroka;A commander of the special research troop, sent to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDLDF5_Under_02_all] to obtain the relics containing instructions on the use of Idgel. She is a member of the third unit of the Beritra Army.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDF5_U2_P_VriRP_Ri_N_65_Ae2
string.body: Supreme Healer Tagnu;A commander of the special research troop, sent to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDLDF5_Under_02_all] to obtain the relics with instructions on the use of Idgel. She is a member of the 3rd troop of the Beritra Army.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDF5_U2_P_VriRP_As_N_65_Ae2
string.body: Blade Terror Ukahim;A commander of the special research troop, sent to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDLDF5_Under_02_all] to obtain the relics containing instructions on the use of Idgel. He is a member of the third unit of the Beritra Army.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDVritra_Base_Drakan_As_65_Ae2_Nmd
string.body: Guard Captain Rohuka;A member of the 40th Beritra Army Brigade General's escort. Sita promoted him due to his outstanding skills, and he is now acting as the guard captain in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDVritra_Base_all].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDVritra_Base_Drakan_Gi_65_Ae2_Nmd
string.body: Chief Cannoneer Kurmata;The chief cannoneer of the 40th Beritra Army Brigade General's escort, and superior officer to all other cannoneers. She can be found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDVritra_Base_all].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDVritra_Base_Drakan_Wi_65_Ae2_Nmd
string.body: Researcher Teselik;A researcher of the 40th Beritra Army Brigade General's advisers. She is researching the weapons in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDVritra_Base_all] and enjoys Sita's confidence.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDVritra_Base_Drakan_Fi_65_Ae2_Nmd
string.body: Supply Commander Ranodim;A supply commander of the 40th Beritra Army Brigade General's escort in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDVritra_Base_all]. He was promoted to commander because of his extensive combat experience.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDVritra_Base_Drakan_Guardian_65_Ae2_Nmd
string.body: Chief of Staff Moriata;The chief of staff of the 40th Beritra Army Brigade General's escort. He can be found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDVritra_Base_all]. Although he doesn't look it, he is very resourceful and experienced, and thus very well suited as chief of staff.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDVritra_Base_Fake_Box_65_An
string.body: Key Box of Mystery;A key box that can be found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDVritra_Base_all]. It contains the keys to the hidden Rune chamber.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDVritra_Base_Shita_B5_65_Ah_Nmd
string.body: Brigade General Sita of the 40th Army;Brigade general and Commander of the 40th Beritra Army's Reconnaissance Troop. She can be found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDVritra_Base_all].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDVritra_Base_Shugo_Nurse_65_Ae
string.body: War Depot Researcher[pl:"Researchers"];A Shugo researcher who was imprisoned in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDVritra_Base_all] and is being forced to research the ancient weapon as well as Idgel, its energy source.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDVritra_Base_Drakan_Fi_65_Ae2
string.body: Sauro Superior Attacker[pl:"Attackers"] of the 40th Army;A superior attacker of the 40th Beritra Army, can be found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDVritra_Base_all].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDVritra_Base_Drakan_Ri_65_Ae2
string.body: Sauro Superior Tamer[pl:"Tamers"] of the 40th Army;A superior tamer of the 40th Beritra Army, can be found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDVritra_Base_all].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDVritra_Base_Drakan_Wi_65_Ae2
string.body: Sauro Superior Foot Soldier[pl:"Soldiers"] of the 40th Army;A superior foot soldier of the 40th Beritra Army, can be found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDVritra_Base_all].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDVritra_Base_Drakan_As_65_Ae2
string.body: Sauro Superior Trapper[pl:"Trappers"] of the 40th Army;A superior trapper of the 40th Beritra Army, can be found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDVritra_Base_all].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDVritra_Base_Drakan_Gu_65_Ae2
string.body: Sauro Superior Sniper[pl:"Snipers"] of the 40th Army;A superior sniper of the 40th Beritra Army, can be found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDVritra_Base_all].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDVritra_Base_Drakan_Pr_65_Ae2
string.body: Sauro Superior Medic[pl:"Medics"] of the 40th Army;A superior medic of the 40th Beritra Army, can be found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDVritra_Base_all].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDVritra_Base_Drakan_Ba_65_Ae2
string.body: Sauro Superior Military Musician[pl:"Musicians"] of the 40th Army;A superior military musician of the 40th Beritra Army, can be found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDVritra_Base_all].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Under_CoffinA_65_n
string.body: Forgotten[pl:"Forgotten"] Grave[pl:"Graves"];One of the many graves in the Katalam Underground, probably from the time of the Rune Tribe. What they contain is not known.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF5_under_Vri_Poison_Q_01
string.body: Inspector Chardu;An inspector of the Beritra Army Reconnaissance Troop. She is wandering around in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_ZONE_NAME_LDF5_SZ_F1] and in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_ZONE_NAME_LDF5_SZ_F2] and is collecting information about these regions.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF5_under_Vri_Poison_Q_02
string.body: Inspector Avanoha;An inspector of the Beritra Army Reconnaissance Troop. She is wandering around in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_ZONE_NAME_LDF5_SZ_W1] and in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_ZONE_NAME_LDF5_SZ_W2] and is collecting information about these regions.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF5_under_Vri_Poison_Q_03
string.body: Inspector Pijagan;An inspector of the Beritra Army Reconnaissance Troop. She is wandering around in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_ZONE_NAME_LDF5_SZ_R1] and in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_ZONE_NAME_LDF5_SZ_R2] and is collecting information about these regions.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Under_GhostRune_Q_01
string.body: Furious Aradel;A furious spirit of the ancient Rune Tribe, planning to contaminate the Katalam Underground with Idium. He is wandering around near the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_ZONE_NAME_LDF5_SZ_F1].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Under_GhostRune_Q_02
string.body: Vengeful Ruanan;A spirit of the ancient Rune Tribe, hell-bent on revenge and planning to contaminate the Katalam Underground with Idium. He is wandering around near the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_ZONE_NAME_LDF5_SZ_B1].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Under_GhostRune_Q_03
string.body: Resentful Isran;A spirit of the ancient Rune Tribe, consumed by malice and planning to contaminate the Katalam Underground with Idium. He is wandering around near the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_ZONE_NAME_LDF5_SZ_C1].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Under_GhostRune_Q_04
string.body: Hateful Sorodus;A spirit of the ancient Rune Tribe, detests life and is planning to contaminate the Katalam Underground with Idium. He is wandering around near the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_ZONE_NAME_LDF5_SZ_W2].

string.body: Generator[pl:"Generators"] at the Guard Post;A Balaur generator that was installed at the furthest guard post from Jormungand's Bridge. The generator needs to be shut off so that the guard post can be captured and the bridge operation switch used.

string.body: Generator[pl:"Generators"] at the North Post;A Balaur generator that was installed at the northern guard post by Jormungand's Bridge. The generator needs to be shut off so that the guard post can be captured and the bridge operation switch used.

string.body: Generator[pl:"Generators"] at the South Post;A Balaur generator that was installed at the southern guard post by Jormungand's Bridge. The generator needs to be shut off so that the guard post can be captured and the bridge operation switch used.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_IDF5_U1_VriFlag04_65_e
string.body: Generator[pl:"Generators"] at the Defence Post;A Balaur generator that was installed at the innermost guard post by Jormungand's Bridge. The generator needs to be shut off so that the guard post can be captured and the bridge operation switch can be used.

string.body: Black Claw Lookout[pl:"Lookouts"];A Black Claw Mau Lookout guarding the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1A_13].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4b_T2_Monster_Q20061A
string.body: Fragmented Gapemaw[pl:"Gapemaws"];A creature that was summoned by the Heart of Gravity near the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T2_A1]. Its destruction will open a Space-Time Rift.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_TKrallKeeper_15_An
string.body: Tursin Protector[pl:"Protectors"];A Krall Guard standing watch over Kobolds in the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA13].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDLF1a_VritraNew1
string.body: Kadasha, Slayer of the 45th Army;A Slayer of the Beritra Army. He seems to have come through the Abyss Gate on a special mission.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDLF2_VritraNew2
string.body: Captain of the 45th Army Tarbana;A captain of the Beritra Army. His outstanding skill has earned him the full confidence of his Brigade General. It seems he was sent to the Abyss Gate on an urgent matter.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDLF3CL_LehparIcaronixQ_45_AhN
string.body: Icaronix the Traitor;An Elyos linked with memories of the past. He committed treason and went into hiding in the aftermath.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_KrallFighterMadQ_42_AeN
string.body: Inspection Officer of the 45th Army;A Beritra Army Inspection Officer. He is guarding the Kishar Krall in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_E1]. [%dic:STR_DIC_M_NagaFighterNM_47_AhN] is his superior.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_NagaFighterNM_47_AhN
string.body: Vitusa, Staff Officer of the 45th Army;A Beritra Army Staff Officer posted in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_009]. He is said to be extremely resourceful.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4b_T4_Yun_Ghost_Named_60_AnN
string.body: Supply Officer[pl:"Officers"] of the 40th Army;A Supply Officer of the Beritra Army Reconnaissance Troop, watching the Dragonbound in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T4_A2].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4b_T3_Monster_Q10062A
string.body: Fragment[pl:"Fragments"] of Wrath;A fragment that can be found near the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T3_S7].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_KrallKeepHKOfficer_37_Ae
string.body: Kaidan Splitter[pl:"Splitters"];A Krall in charge of the patrols in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_K].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LF3E3_AeB_LizardAs_45_Ae
string.body: 52nd Draconute Superior Trooper[pl:"Troopers"];A Draconute soldier guarding the weapons hidden in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_009].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_DF3_NM_ElementalAirCh_37_Q_An
string.body: Frost Parasite[pl:"Parasites"];A parasite that prevents Kasadrasil from waking. It is summoned when you attempt to wake Kasadrasil.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4b_VriTR_Pr_60_Q2_An
string.body: Protector[pl:"Protectors"] of the Heart of Fissure;A Balaur Protector who is guarding the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T1_S8].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LF3E3_PeA2_NagaPrD_46_Ae
string.body: 52nd Naga High Acolyte[pl:"Acolytes"];A Nagarant soldier of the Indratu Legion who is guarding the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_009].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDF5_TD_War_Door_02
string.body: Destructible Fortress Wall[pl:"Walls"];One of the entrances to the gate of the Steel Wall Bastion battlefield. You must destroy it if you wish to reach the gate from the left.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDF5_TD_War_Door_03
string.body: Postern Gate[pl:"Gates"] to the Canal;One of the entrances to the gate of the Steel Wall Bastion battlefield. You must destroy it if you wish to reach the gate from the right through the canal.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDF5_TD_War_Door_04
string.body: Main Gate[pl:"Gates"] to the Canal;One of the entrances to the gate of the Steel Wall Bastion battlefield. You must destroy it if you wish to reach the gate from the right through the canal.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDF5_TD_War_Door_05
string.body: Right Gate[pl:"Gates"];One of the doors to the gate of the Steel Wall Bastion Battlefield. You must destroy this fortress gate if you wish to reach the gate from the right.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDF5_TD_War_Door_06
string.body: Left Gate[pl:"Gates"];One of the doors to the gate of the Steel Wall Bastion Battlefield. You must destroy this fortress gate if you wish to reach the gate from the left.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDF5_TD_War_PC_TankTBM
string.body: Auxiliary Siege Tank[pl:"Tanks"];A siege weapon for destroying the accesses to the Steel Wall Bastion battlefield and the Fortress Wall. You require a special fuel and special ammunition in order to use it.

string.body: Captain Gartasha of the 96th Invasion Troop;The captain of the Invasion Troop of the 45th Beritra Army, who commands the 96th outpost in Akaron. It appears that this troop set up the Invasion Corridor and the Invasion Generator at Beritra's orders.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4_Advance_Vri_Fi_QN_65_D_An
string.body: Captain Virka of the 100th Invasion Troop;The captain of the Invasion Troop of the 45th Beritra Army, who commands the 96th outpost in Akaron. It appears that this troop set up the Invasion Corridor and the Invasion Generator at Beritra's orders.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDLDF4_Re_01_DrakanMage_Wi_65_An
string.body: Senior Baruna Researcher[pl:"Researchers"];A scientist who researched the technology for the Invasion Corridor at the Baruna Research Laboratory. He possesses a vital material.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDLDF4_Re_01_BOSS_Fi_N_65_Ae
string.body: Belsagos;A mysterious creature which has invaded the Baruna Research Laboratory. It originates from a dimension far from Atreia, and is currently confined in the Central Laboratory.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDLDF5_Fortress_Re_Boss_65_Ah
string.body: Slayer Kunax;An ancient creature that lives in[%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDLDF5_Fortress_Re] and has apparently defeated countless opponents in the ancient arena. It is an important research object, so both the Beritra Army and the Elyos and Asmodians all have their sights set on it.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_DF4_C3_DarkGuard_65_Nmd_Q
string.body: Asmodian Overseer[pl:"Overseers"];An Asmodian Guardian who is observing the entrance to the Silentera Canyon of Gelkmaros.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LF4_C1_LightGuard_65_Nmd_Q
string.body: Elyos Overseer[pl:"Overseers"];An Elyos Guardian who is observing the Inggison entrance to the Silentera Canyon.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF4_Advance_FOBJ_G_Idol
string.body: Popoku Idol[pl:"Idols"];A Popoku Idol shaped like a Balaur. The more of them you own, the better you reputation will be.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4_Advance_Vri_Strong_Named_Fi_65_Ae
string.body: Battle Commander[pl:"Commanders"] of the 90th Conquest Squad;A commander who is chief of the 90th Invasion Base in the Tiamat Basin.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4_Advance_FrillFaimam_65_n
string.body: Sawtooth Frillneck[pl:"Frillnecks"];A Frillneck that inhabits the Invasion Valley.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4_Advance_Mudthorn_Moss_65_An
string.body: Contaminated Swamp Mudthorn[pl:"Mudthorns"];An aggressive plant that grows along the Expedition Troop's marching route.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4_Advance_Dionaea_65_An
string.body: Akaron Dionae;A plant that grows along the Expedition Troop's marching route. It squirts a dangerous liquid.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4_Advance_ElementalEarth3_65_An
string.body: Stately Fladia[pl:"Fladias"];A specimen of the Fladia family growing primarily along the Expedition Troop's marching route. Its enticing fragrance lures enemies.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4_Advance_Ettin_65_An
string.body: Looter[pl:"Looters"] of the Plateau Ettin;A wild form of the Plateau Ettin, found primarily on the Valpurah Plateau.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4_Advance_J_rhinoce_Green_65_n
string.body: Wandering Valley Rynoce[pl:"Rynoces"];A Rynoce found primarily on the Valpurah Plateau.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4_Advance_Popoku_Fi_65_An
string.body: Popoku Robber[pl:"Robbers"];The Raider lives near the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_SZ_I_01] and is especially aggressive in combat.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4_Advance_Popoku_Pr_65_An
string.body: Popoku Healer[pl:"Healers"];The Healer lives near the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_SZ_I_01].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4_Advance_Popoku_Wi_65_An
string.body: Popoku Shaman[pl:"Shamans"];The Shaman can be found near the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_SZ_I_01].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4_Advance_Popoku_As_65_An
string.body: Popoku Raider[pl:"Raiders"];A warrior from the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_SZ_I_01]. His strength lies in surprise attacks.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4_Advance_Chapire_Fi_65_An
string.body: Chapir Robber[pl:"Robbers"];A robber of the Chapir tribe, usually found at the Akaron Beach.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4_Advance_Chapire_Pr_65_n
string.body: Chapir Healer[pl:"Healers"];A healer of the Chapir tribe, usually found at the Akaron Beach.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4_Advance_Chapire_Wi_65_n
string.body: Chapir Shaman[pl:"Shamans"];A shaman of the Chapir tribe, usually found at the Akaron Beach.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4_Advance_Chapire_As_65_An
string.body: Chapir Attacker[pl:"Attackers"];An attacker of the Chapir tribe, usually found at the Akaron Beach.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4_Advance_TiamatLoser_Fi_65_An_Talk
string.body: Legionary[pl:"Legionaries"] of the 45th Raider Squad;A legionary of the survivors of Tiamat's Legion, which capitulated to the Beritra Army. He fights for the Beritra Army and is guarding the Elger Expedition Camp.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4_Advance_TiamatLoserF_Ra_65_An
string.body: Scout[pl:"Scouts"] of the 45th Raider Squad;A scout of the survivors of Tiamat's Legion, which capitulated to the Beritra Army. He fights for the Beritra Army and is guarding the Elger Expedition Camp.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4_Advance_TiamatLoser_Wi_65_An
string.body: Battle Mage[pl:"Mages"] of the 45th Raider Squad;A battle mage of the survivors of Tiamat's Legion, which capitulated to the Beritra Army. He fights for the Beritra Army and is guarding the Elger Expedition Camp.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4_Advance_TiamatLoser_Pr_65_An_Talk
string.body: Booster[pl:"Boosters"] of the 45th Raider Squad;A booster of the survivors of Tiamat's Legion, which capitulated to the Beritra Army. He fights for the Beritra Army and is guarding the Elger Expedition Camp.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Fortress_Recon_Q_v01_Dr_Ri_65_An
string.body: Emergency Liaison Officer[pl:"Officers"] of the 701st Vanguard;Scouts from the Beritra Army who appear at the[%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_B2] when the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_A1_v01] has been captured by the Elyos or the Asmodians.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Fortress_Recon_Q_v01_Li_Fi_65_An
string.body: Liaison[pl:"Liaisons"] of the 701st Scout Troop;Scouts from the Elyos Katalam Patrol who appear at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_A4] when the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_A1_v01] has been captured by the Asmodians.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Fortress_Recon_Q_v01_Da_Fi_65_An

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Fortress_Boss_Anoha_65_Al
string.body: Raging Anoha;Appears when the Brigade General of the Invasion Legion removes the seal from the [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Fortress_Named_Spawn_FOBJ]. In his lifetime, Anoha was a famed hero of the Rune Tribe. He lost his mind in the explosion of Kaldor, and now exists as an angry spirit.

string.body: Valley Path Malodor[pl:"Malodors"];A carnivorous plant in Akaron. It shoots thorns at anything that gets close.

string.body: Anush;An Undead Drakan in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_F_01]. He sacrificed everything for Tiamat and was always loyal to her. There are rumours that he not only gave her his devotion, he also gave her his heart. But she did not return his love. When he was no longer useful to Tiamat, she placed a curse upon him that turned him into an Undead.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LF6_B2_24_Named_SkeletonKing_70_Al
string.body: Barteon;According to legend, Barteon was the Pirate King who was searching for treasure off the coast of Esterra. When he failed, his hatred towards Aion grew. He was then cursed by the Empyrean Lord. He could no longer transform during daylight and became a monster called Nasqui. He can often be seen when the sun sets at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF6_SZ_B2_Ship].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_DF6_B2_24_Named_Birdmom_70_Al
string.body: Ventus;The cursed body of Sphiro, whose soul has long since departed. It occasionally appears in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_B2] after the sun has risen.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_DF6_C_6_Named_DemonTree_68_Ah
string.body: Urughal;An unknown creature in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_C_Deepwood] that appears at daybreak. It absorbs the essence of the forest, creating [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF6_C_Environment_DemonTree_67_An]. It looks man-made.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_DF6_T_E_Fanatic_Wi_69_An
string.body: Fanatic[pl:"Fanatics"];Crazed fanatics who want to sacrifice the Elyos Guardians on the Floating Island over the[%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_E] for the sake of their nefarious plans.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_DF6_FOBJ_Sacrifice_Guardian_01
string.body: Imprisoned Guardian[pl:"Guardians"];An Elyos soldier who will be sacrificed on the Floating Island above the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_E] by the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF6_T_E_Fanatic_Wi_69_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_DF6_F2_24_Named_DeathKnight_70_Al
string.body: Berson;Leader of the Daevas who guarded the Tower of Eternity before the Cataclysm. He was trapped in a rift between space and time. Now he believes all Daevas are Balaur. He can be found at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_F2_Square].

string.body: Ghost;A spirit who appears at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_G_Lake] during the night.

string.body: Kurubi;Frequently appears when the Saphora flowers bloom at night in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_I_Queen].

string.body: Einod;One of Aion's creatures who appears on the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_LF6_SZ_F2_square] as soon as the sun sets. They say she is a type of Petralith.

string.body: Mahorosh;A Balaur Captain who is responsible for the abducted Daevas in Sakra Prison Camp and guards the Tranquil Path. Can be found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDAb1_Ere_22].

string.body: Klaw Worker[pl:"Workers"] of the Fallusha Army;A Klaw who supplies Sakrapes' roots with Sakra Essence. Can be found next to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDAb1_Ere_35].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDAb1_Ere_Boss_Witch_01_75_Ah
string.body: Arrogant Frida;One of the Fallushas from the Ereshkigal Legion who is trying to enchant Sakrapes' Roots. Can be found at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDAb1_Ere_36] .

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDAb1_Ere_Boss_Witch_02_75_Ah

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDAb1_Ere_Boss_Witch_03_75_Ah

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDAb1_Ere_Boss_Witch_04_75_Ah
string.body: Greedy Grida;One of the Fallushas from the Ereshkigal Legion who is trying to enchant Sakrapes' Roots. Can be found at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDAb1_Ere_36] .

string.name: STR_DIC_M_Surprise_Debrie_01
string.body: Tame Ribbit;A peaceful ribbit. It was originally intended to frighten someone, but a very tame specimen was chosen by mistake.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDAb1_Ere_1round_Drakan_High_Ra
string.body: Triaris[pl:"Triaris"] of the Fallusha Army;A Balaur from the Ereshkigal Legion. Follows the Daevas who broke out of the Sakra Prison Camp. Can be found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDAb1_Ere_04].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDAb1_Ere_2Round_Drakan_High_Fi_All
string.body: Drakan Bodyguard[pl:"Bodyguards"] of the Fallusha Army;A Balaur from the Ereshkigal Legion. Tracks Daevas on the Tranquil Path. Can be found on the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDAb1_Ere_34].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDEternity_03_Def_Boss_75
string.body: Ganesh;An artefact protector who guards the Museum of Knowledge.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDEternity_03_Dimension_Boss_01
string.body: Bulion;A dimensional monster who appeared from the Rift.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDEternity_03_Dimension_Boss_Potal_01
string.body: Bulion's Tentacle;A tentacle from the dimensional monster Bulion. The entrance to Bulion's heart appears as soon as the tentacle is eliminated.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDEternity_03_Dimension_Boss_02
string.body: Bulion's Heart;The heart of the dimensional monster Bulion. Bulion loses his unlimited regeneration powers only when his heart is destroyed.

string.body: Nutritious Ginseng;An aromatic Golden Saam which grows in the Kumuki Hideout. Appears in the Abandoned Refinery, in the Kumuki Guard Tower and in the Abandoned Factory.

string.body: Tigric Leader;Leader of the Tigrics who have invaded the Cellatu Territory. Tigrics are diurnal.

string.body: Drakan Attack Officer[pl:"Officers"] of the Fallusha Army;A Balaur attack officer who guards Narakkalli. Can be found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDAb1_Ere_04].

string.body: Drakan Triaris[pl:"Triaris"] of the Fallusha Army;A Balaur Triaris who guards Narakkalli. Can be found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDAb1_Ere_04].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDSweep_Live_S2_Nmd_05
string.body: Commander Grodi;The mighty leader of the Shugo Bandits. He appears when you stop the Shugo Bandits.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LF6_White_Choco_Saam_A
string.body: White Chocolate Ginseng[pl:"Ginsengs"];A ginseng monster in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF6] with the colour of white chocolate. Appears where a Space-Time Rift is created.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_DF6_Dark_Choco_Saam_A
string.body: Dark Chocolate Ginseng[pl:"Ginsengs"];A ginseng monster in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6] with the colour of dark chocolate. Appears where a Space-Time Rift is created.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_DF6_T_A1_Bookie_67_n
string.body: Sky Spirit[pl:"Spirits"];A spirit that enjoys teasing people. It appears on the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_A1].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_DF6_T_A2_Mudthorn_67_An
string.body: Wandering Mudthorn[pl:"Mudthorns"];An aggressive Mudthorn shaped like a tree. It appears in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_A2].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_Zaif_30_An
string.body: Fanged Worg[pl:"Worgs"];An animal which inhabits Heiron. It is highly aggressive.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_CrestlichReD_30_n
string.body: Meek Crestlich;A flightless bird that can be seen near the Beluslan Fortress. Its tender meat is used in many dishes.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_VespaD_30_n
string.body: Plains Vespine;A Vespine found near entrance of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_A].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_VaranusRe2D_30_n
string.body: Blue Jaw Monitor;A type of Monitor that has [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2502a].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_Ab1_Mission_Eresh_Ra_65_Ae
string.body: Low-ranking Defence Troop Tracker[pl:"Trackers"];Member of the Ereshkigal Legion in the Upper Abyss.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_Underpass_Sheluk_55_An
string.body: Baby Stinging Sheluk[pl:"Sheluks"];One of the poisonous insects found across the Silentera Canyon. A young Stinging Sheluk.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_Underpass_Octacide_55_An
string.body: Brown Arachna Spawn;One of the poisonous insects found across the Silentera Canyon. A young Brown Arachna.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_Underpass_Scorpion_55_An
string.body: Black Claw Scolopen Hatchling[pl:"Hatchlings"];One of the poisonous insects found across the Silentera Canyon. A young Blackclaw Scolopen.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_Underpass_M_SouledStone_List_all
string.body: Baby Poison Stinger[pl:"Stingers"];Includes the young [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_Underpass_Sheluk_55_An], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_Underpass_Octacide_55_An] and [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_Underpass_Scorpion_55_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1011_Guard_Q13943
string.body: Protectorate of the Divine Fortress;Appears when the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_46] can be captured. Includes the Scouts, Guardians, Recruits, Elite Scouts, Elite Guardians and Elite Recruits of the 35th Divine Fortress Legion.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1011_Guard_Q13944
string.body: Commander[pl:"Commanders"] of the Divine Fortress;Appears when the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_46] can be captured. Includes the Slayers and the Captains of the 35th Divine Fortress Legion.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1011_Artifact_Q13945
string.body: Divine Fortress Artefact Protector[pl:"Protectors"];Protector of the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1011_Artifact_All]. If you defeat the Protector and capture the Artefact, this will activate a Siege Cannon which you can use to demolish the outer Fortress Gate.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1011_Artifact_All
string.body: Divine Fortress Artefact[pl:"Artefacts"];These include the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1011_Artifact_A], the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1011_Artifact_B] and the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1011_Artifact_C] near the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_46].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1011_Artifact_A
string.body: Fantastic Smash[pl:"Smashes"];Deals substantial Illusion damage to all enemies within the area the moment the Artefact is activated.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1011_Artifact_B
string.body: Fantastic Flame;Increases the maximum HP of all allies within the area of effect the moment the Artefact is activated.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1011_Artifact_C
string.body: Fantastic Mutation;Turns all enemies within the area of effect into Mookies the moment the Artefact is activated.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1011_OutDoor_Weapon_L
string.body: Deactivated Elyos Siege Cannon[pl:"Cannons"];This gets activated once the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1011_Artifact_All] has been captured.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1011_OutDoor_Weapon_D
string.body: Deactivated Asmodian Siege Cannon[pl:"Cannons"];This gets activated once the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1011_Artifact_All] has been captured.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1011_OutDoor
string.body: Outer Gate[pl:"Gates"] to the Divine Fortress;The gate appears once the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_46] can be captured. If you capture the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1011_Artifact_All], this will activate a Siege Cannon which is capable of demolishing the outer Fortress Gate.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1011_Tower
string.body: Reinforcement[pl:"Reinforcements"] of the Inner Fortress gate;A facility built by the Balaur to reinforce the inner gate of the Divine Fortress. The defence of the inner fortress gate can be weakened if the Elyos or the Asmodians use the holy item.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1011_InDoor
string.body: Inner Gate[pl:"Gates"] to the Divine Fortress;This gate appears once the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_46] can be captured. The defence of the inner fortress gate can be weakened if the Elyos or the Asmodians neutralise the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1011_Tower].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1011_Boss_v58_Dr_All
string.body: Guardian General[pl:"Generals"] of the Divine Fortress;A Guardian General who appears when the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_46] can be captured. You can recapture the fortress if you kill him.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1011_Page2_Guard_All
string.body: Revived Ice Soldier[pl:"Soldiers"];A soldier in the Oris Legion who appears when the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_46] is captured.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LF4_DayQ_DrakanFi_54_An
string.body: Blackheart Lakali;A former Balaur captive who escaped to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF4_SZ_C3].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LF4_DayQ_DrakanWi_54_An
string.body: Nakra Oracle;An oracle who has lived in Hanarkand for a long time. The city's spiritual leader.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_DF4_DaQ_Vampire_DR_54
string.body: Vinestem Hereta;Extends its vines out ever further.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_DF4_DaQ_DrakanFi_Re_54
string.body: Tahbakun;Rumoured to have appeared near the Drana contaminated area of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_SZ_DF4_C1].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Fortress_Fre_Monster_01_Q10110
string.body: Panting Metodon[pl:"Metodons"];A creature which emerged from Fregion's Flaming Breath. Appears near the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_C1] in Kaldor.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Fortress_Fre_Monster_02_Q10110
string.body: Flaming Mane Graphier[pl:"Graphiers"];A creature which emerged from Fregion's Flaming Breath. Appears near the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_SZ_C2] in Kaldor.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_Ab1_Eresh_Fi_Event
string.body: Protector[pl:"Protectors"] of the Eye of Reshanta;A Balaur who protects the Eye of Reshanta. Found at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_47].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_Ab1_Eresh_Fi_Event_Named
string.body: Bodyguard[pl:"Bodyguards"] of the Eye of Reshanta;A Balaur officer who protects the Eye of Reshanta. Found at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_47].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDAbRe_Core_03_Witch_Boss_Ae
string.body: Singing Kirshka;Senior Fallusha of the Ereshkigal Legion. Uses magic to raise the fallen Ereshkigal legionnaires from the dead. Can be found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDAbRe_Core_03].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_F4_Raid_Drakan_Boss_55_Ah
string.body: Adjutant Anuhart;A Drakan of the Tahabata Legion. Nobody knows why he appears in the Silentera Canyon.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_F4_Raid_Nepilim_Boss_55_Ah
string.body: Gatekeeper Krumarim;An old Jotun protecting the Silentera Canyon.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_F4_CRaid_4th_Fanatic_Fi_Boss_55_Al
string.body: Sarkan;Leader of the Dragonbound occupying the Abandoned Crimson Temple.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_F4_CRaid_3rd_Fanatic_Fi_Boss_55_Al
string.body: Azartum;Leader of the Dragonbound occupying the Abandoned Vorgaltem Citadel.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_F4_CRaid_2nd_Fanatic_Fi_Boss_55_Al
string.body: Shamra;Leader of the Dragonbound occupying the Abandoned Temple of Scales.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_F4_CRaid_Fanatic_Fi_Boss_55_Al
string.body: Humbaki;Leader of the Dragonbound occupying the Altar of Avarice.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDAbRe_Core_03_A1_Witch_An
string.body: Ironhook Neigel;A Balaur of the Kirshka Army. Can be found in the inspection hall in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDAbRe_Core_03].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDAbRe_Core_03_A2_Witch_D_All
string.body: Administrator[pl:"Administrators"] of the Soul Icon Wardstone;A Balaur who is responsible for the Soul Icon Wardstone in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDAbRe_Core_03]. Can be found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDAbRe_Core_03].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_World_event_halloween_JOL_party
string.body: Pumpkin King[pl:"Kings"];The king of the Pumpkins. Every Halloween, he steals the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80975a] and hides himself deep inside the instance.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDEvent_Def_ZombieKing_65
string.body: Cursed Daeva Soul[pl:"Souls"];The soul of a Daeva who died from the contaminated water. Woodush controls it, making it attack the Hell Pass.
